snippet.title: Bus Simulator 18: Environment Trailer (EN)
snippet.description:
Good news! Today we are happy to announce, that Bus Simulator 18 will be ready for departure one week earlier than originally planned. The new release date is June 13, 2018! 

In order to "sweeten" the waiting time, our new environment trailer offers a first impression of the different districts of the vibrant city of Seaside Valley and its surrounding countryside.

For more information, please visit:

Homepage & Newsletter:
http://www.bussimulator-game.com/

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/BusSimulatorGame/

Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/BusSimGame

Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/bussimgame/

Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/515180/Bus_Simulator_18/
